bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1./usr/sbin/rpc.nfsd -u 2. 3.
Actual results: /usr/sbin/rpc.nfsd: invalid option -- 'u' Invalid argument: '?' Usage: rpc.nfsd [-d|--debug] [-H hostname] [-p|-P|--port port] [-N|--no-nfs-version version] [-V|--nfs-version version] [-s|--syslog] [-t|--tcp] [-T|--no-tcp] [-u|--udp] [-U|--no-udp] [-r|--rdma=] [-G|--grace-time secs] [-L|--leasetime secs] nrservs
Expected results: OK
Additional info:
*** Bug 1451568 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
nfs-utils-2.1.1-5.rc4.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-d52b9cd07f
nfs-utils-2.1.1-5.rc4.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-6ab3e72bd6

nfs-utils-2.1.1-5.rc4.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-6ab3e72bd6

nfs-utils-2.1.1-5.rc4.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-d52b9cd07f
nfs-utils-2.1.1-5.rc4.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
nfs-utils-2.1.1-5.rc4.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

NFS hung on installation/restart, had to force a hard reboot. Perhaps reopen this bug?

(In reply to RobbieTheK from comment #8) > NFS hung on installation/restart, had to force a hard reboot. Perhaps reopen > this bug? > hmm... This bug was a fix to rpc.nfsd command line... so no I don't think reopening this bug is the right thing to do.
